Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma and Yashasvi Jaiswal enter the field to bat
Rahmunnal Gurbaz wanted a second but Kohli and Sanju Samson behind the wickets combined to run Naib out
Gurbaz makes proper contact but a fast Washington Sundar ensures Afgan got no more than a single
Nabi blasts a maximum to lift Afghan spirits
Nabi misses a beautiful delivery from Mukesh and runs by
Rohit Sharma swings, the ball crosses the boundary rope by a whisker. Six runs for India
Rohit Sharma smashes Fareed Ahmad for a straight six
Rohit finds a boundary over the third man area. Afghan had no protection near the ropes.
Rinku Singh goes for a golden duck
Ravi Bishnoi gets Nabi first ball! Rinku Singh takes a catch at the boundary line
Ravi Bishnoi gets Gurbaz to finish the game. Another simple catch for Rinku Singh
Post-Match Reflections: Hard feelings are likely to be evident in the post-match interviews as India and Afghanistan will be left wondering what could have been
Miscellaneous Highlights: A Super Over to settle a Super Over! Here is the thrilling contest as it happened
The match was played at Bengaluru's M Chinnaswamy Stadium
